sourcesContent:
export const projects = [
    {
      title: "Payment Tracker",
      subtitle: "MVC",
      description:
        "This bill payment tracker app allows users to enter and view information about bills and payments for them, and to schedule reminders for bills that are due soon.",
      image: "./bill.jpg",
      link: "https://s2robertson-payment-tracker-2c1497a835bb.herokuapp.com/",
    },
    {
      title: "Code Quiz",
      subtitle: "JavaScript/CSS",
      description:
        "This is a simple quiz app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to take a quiz and get a score based on their answers.The quiz consists of multiple-choice questions and the user has a limited amount of time to complete the quiz",
      image: "./quiz.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/Code-Quiz-C4/",
    },
    {
      title: "Password Generator",
      subtitle: "Javascript",
      description:
        "This is a simple web application that generates a random password based on user preferences. The user can select the length of characters and types.",
      image: "./password.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/Password-generator-C3-UofT/",
    },
    {
      title: "Weather Dashboard",
      subtitle: "Full Stack",
      description:
        "This is a weather app that allows users to search for a city and get the current weather and a 5-day forecast for that city. The app uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch weather data.",
      image: "./weather.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/forecast-C6/",
    },
  ];
